languages.text: "Мечтай-мечтай. Самый тугоухий и сиплый вокс-оператор Толиман — на средние палубы!"
"Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"
languages.original_text: "Мечтай-мечтай. Самый тугоухий и сиплый вокс-оператор Толиман — на средние палубы!"

traits.locale_text: "Dream on. Vox Operator Toliman, the hardest of hearing, the raspiest — to the middle decks!"
"Dream on. Vox Operator Toliman, the hardest of hearing, the raspiest — to the middle decks!"
"Dream on. As if she'd send Vox Operator Toliman, ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, to the middle decks!"
"Dream on. As if she'd send Vox Operator Toliman, ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, to the middle decks!"
"Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"
"Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

languages.text: «Sigue soñando. ¡Como si fuera a enviar al orgullo de los operadores de voco de los Toliman, por viejo, medio muerto y ronco que esté, a las cubiertas centrales!».
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: «Sigue soñando. ¡Como si fuera a enviar al orgullo de los operadores de voco de los Toliman, por viejo, medio muerto y ronco que esté, a las cubiertas centrales!».

languages.text: 「夢を見よう。さながら、トリマンが誇りとしていた、半分ボケた年寄りのヴォクスオペレーターを中層デッキに送り込んだかのようにね」
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: 「夢を見よう。さながら、トリマンが誇りとしていた、半分ボケた年寄りのヴォクスオペレーターを中層デッキに送り込んだかのようにね」

languages.text: “做你的白日梦吧！说得就好像你这种耳朵又背、声音又哑的老家伙是托里曼家族的骄傲，必须升迁到中层甲板一样！”
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: “做你的白日梦吧！说得就好像你这种耳朵又背、声音又哑的老家伙是托里曼家族的骄傲，必须升迁到中层甲板一样！”

languages.text: "Träumt weiter. Als würde sie den alten, halb tauben und heiseren Stolz des Toliman-Voxpersonals auf die mittleren Decks schicken!"
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: "Träumt weiter. Als würde sie den alten, halb tauben und heiseren Stolz des Toliman-Voxpersonals auf die mittleren Decks schicken!"

languages.text: « Mais oui, c'est ça. Comme si elle allait envoyer la fierté des opérateurs-vox Toliman, aussi décrépit et à moitié sourd qu'il soit, sur les ponts intermédiaires ! »
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"

traits.locale_text: « Mais oui, c'est ça. Comme si elle allait envoyer la fierté des opérateurs-vox Toliman, aussi décrépit et à moitié sourd qu'il soit, sur les ponts intermédiaires ! »

languages.text: "Hayal kurmaya devam et. Sanki Toliman voks operatörlerinin gururu, yarı sağır yarı cırtlak ihtiyarın tekini orta güvertelere gönderir de..."
languages.original_text: "Dream on. As if she'd send the ol' half-deaf-and-raspy, pride of the Toliman vox operators, to the middle decks!"
